description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. The story continues in the sequel to Decay - Part 1.  Decay - Part 2 is a thriller/horror adventure game with a very creepy atmosphere and challenging gameplay.  Beat the game and unlock the extras section to get your personal code and download the amazing soundtrack.
